Address.description: The location at which a particular organization or person may be found or reached.

city.description: The name, expressed as text, of the city, town or village of this address.

country.description: A unique country identifier for this party.

postcode.description: A code specifying the postcode of the address.

state.description: The name, expressed as text, of the state of this address.

street.description: A name, expressed as text, of a street or thoroughfare.

address.description: The location at which a particular organization or person may be found or reached.

contactDetails.description: The exchange of thoughts, messages, or information, as universally exchanged by speech, signals, writing, or behaviour between persons and/or organizations.

Charges.description:
A charge made for a logistics related service.
Corresponding EDIFACT element: 4237 - Payment arrangement code.

amount.description: A monetary value applied to this logistics service charge.

calculationBasis.description: The code specifying a basis on which this service charge is to be calculated such as by volume or per unit.

chargeCode.description: The unique identifier for this logistics service charge.

chargeText.description: A textual description of this logistics service charge.

Communication.description: The exchange of thoughts, messages, or information, as universally exchanged by speech, signals, writing, or behaviour between persons and/or organizations.

Consignment.description: A separately identifiable collection of goods items to be transported or available to be transported from one consignor to one consignee via one or more modes of transport where each consignment is the subject of one single transport contract.

mainCarriageTransportMovement.description:
The conveyance (physical carriage) of goods or other objects used for logistics transport purposes.
Corresponding EDIFACT element: 8051 - Transport stage code qualifier.

onCarriageTransportMovement.description:
The conveyance (physical carriage) of goods or other objects used for logistics transport purposes.
Corresponding EDIFACT element: 8051 - Transport stage code qualifier.

placeOfDelivery.description: Corresponding EDIFACT element: 3227 - Location function code qualifier.

placeOfReceipt.description: Corresponding EDIFACT element: 3227 - Location function code qualifier.

portOfDischarge.description: Corresponding EDIFACT element: 3227 - Location function code qualifier.

portOfLoading.description: Corresponding EDIFACT element: 3227 - Location function code qualifier.

preCarriageMovement.description:
The conveyance (physical carriage) of goods or other objects used for logistics transport purposes.
Corresponding EDIFACT element: 8051 - Transport stage code qualifier.

serviceMode.description: The scope of the consignment, such as CY-CY or SD-SD.

transportEquipmentQuantity.description: A number of pieces of transport equipment, such as containers or similar unit load devices, in this consignment.

ConsignmentItem.description: Cargo items. An item within a consignment of goods separately identified for transport and customs purposes.

applicableDangerousGoods.description: A hazardous or non-hazardous substance which may pose risks to people and/or the environment for which the transportation is regulated by dangerous goods regulations.

codeType.description:
The cargo code type of consignment item. 
https://service.unece.org/trade/untdid/d00a/tred/tred7143.htm

codeValue.description: A code specifying a type of consignment item.

grossVolume.description: An amount, size, or extent as established by measuring.

grossWeight.description: The numeric value determined by weight measuring.

information.description: Cargo description. Information, expressed as text, for this consignment item.

sequence.description: The sequence number for this consignment item.

transportPackages.description: A self-contained wrapping or container within which goods can be contained for logistics purposes, such as a box or a barrel which can be filled, partially filled or empty.

DangerousGoods.description: A hazardous or non-hazardous substance which may pose risks to people and/or the environment for which the transportation is regulated by dangerous goods regulations.

UNDGIdentification.description:
The code specifying the unique United Nations Dangerous Goods (UNDG) number assigned to the dangerous goods. 
Kept as an integer, so for example "UN 0487" is provided as 487.

ems.description: The unique transport emergency procedure (EMS) identifier applicable for the dangerous goods.

handlingInstructions.description: Handling instructions for the dangerous goods.

hazardClassVersion.description: The unique identifier of the version of a hazard class for the dangerous goods.

hazardClassification.description: A unique identifier for this hazard classification for the dangerous goods.

hazardInformation.description: Used to indicate Haz Mat Placard (explosive, flammable, etc.)

hazardType.description: A code specifying the type of hazard for the dangerous goods.

information.description: Textual information for the dangerous goods.

marking.description: Marking, expressed as text, for these dangerous goods.

packingDangerLevel.description: A code specifying the packaging danger level for the dangerous goods.

packingInstructionType.description: A code specifying a type of packing instruction for the dangerous goods.

regulationName.description: A name, expressed as text, for a regulation of the dangerous goods.

technicalName.description: A technical name, expressed as text, for the dangerous goods.

Document.description: A collection of data for a piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence.

copyIssued.description: The number of copies issued for this document.

issue.description: A date, time, date time or other date time value for an issuance of this document.

originalIssued.description: The number of originals issued for this document.

originatorId.description: The party identification code (i.e. SCAC) of the organization publishing the event.

originatorName.description: The proper name (human readable) of the entity that published this event.

placeOfIssue.description: Corresponding EDIFACT element: 3227 - Location function code qualifier.

HandlingInstructions.description: Handling instructions for the dangerous goods.

description.description: A textual description of this set of instructions.

Location.description: Corresponding EDIFACT element: 3227 - Location function code qualifier.

UNLocode.description: United Nations Location Code (UNLOCODE) unique identifier for logistics related location.

name.description:
A name, expressed as text, of this logistics related location.
Corresponding EDIFACT element: 3225 - Location name code.

printedLocation.description: The location exactly as printed on the document.

OtherParty.description: Other party related to a consignment.

Party.description:
An individual, a group, or a body having a role in a business function.  Party has a legal connotation in a business transaction.
Corresponding EDIFACT element: 3035 - Party function code qualifier.

address.description: The location at which a particular organization or person may be found or reached.

communicationDetails.description: The exchange of thoughts, messages, or information, as universally exchanged by speech, signals, writing, or behaviour between persons and/or organizations.

name.description: A name, expressed as text, for this party.

printedParty.description: The party name and address exactly as printed on the document.

ReeferSetting.description: A temperature (or other reefer) setting, such as storage temperature or operational temperature, for this piece of transport equipment.

instructions.description: Specific instructions pertaining to the reefer setting.

type.description: The code specifying the type of reefer setting.

unit.description: Unit used for measureing the reefer setting.

value.description: A measure of the value of the reefer setting such as a minimum temperature value of ten degrees Celsius.

Reference.description: Reference number(s) assigned to the document by the issuer such as bill of lading number or sea waybill number.

Seal.description: A device used to secure an object and protect it from unauthorized entry or tampering during transport or other logistics operations.

identification.description: A unique identifier for this logistics seal.

type.description: Description specifying the type of logistics seal.

Stuffing.description: The equipment which (parts of) the consignment is stuffed into.

equipmentNumber.description: Unique identifier of the transport equipment in which cargo is stuffed.

stuffedGrossVolume.description: An amount, size, or extent as established by measuring.

stuffedGrossWeight.description: The numeric value determined by weight measuring.

stuffedTransportPackages.description: A self-contained wrapping or container within which goods can be contained for logistics purposes, such as a box or a barrel which can be filled, partially filled or empty.

billOfLadingNumber.description: Bill of lading number of the transport document.

partBillIndicator.description: Indication of whether or not this is a part bill.

items.description: For part bills, list of the bill of lading numbers to be surrendered along with this document.

shippedOnBoardDate.description: Date when the cargo was shipped on board.

TransportDocumentInformation.description: Specific information printed on the transport document.

TransportEquipment.description: A piece of equipment used to hold, protect or secure cargo for transportation purposes.

items.description: The harmonized system code specifying a type of loaded consignment item(s).

equipmentGrossWeight.description: The numeric value determined by weight measuring.

equipmentNumber.description: Unique identifier for this piece of transport equipment, printed physically on the equipment.

equipmentType.description: ISO 6346 size and type code (for example "45G1")

printedEquipmentType.description: The container size and type, as printed on the transport document (for example "40 DRY 9''6").

TransportMeans.description: The device or method used to convey people, goods, animals or other objects from place to place.

identification.description: An identifier of this logistics means of transport, such as the International Maritime Organization number of a vessel.

name.description: The name, expressed as text, of this logistics means of transport such as the vessel name.

TransportMovement.description:
The conveyance (physical carriage) of goods or other objects used for logistics transport purposes.
Corresponding EDIFACT element: 8051 - Transport stage code qualifier.

identification.description: To identify a journey of a means of transport, for example voyage number, flight number, trip number.

usedTransportMeans.description: The device or method used to convey people, goods, animals or other objects from place to place.

TransportPackage.description: A self-contained wrapping or container within which goods can be contained for logistics purposes, such as a box or a barrel which can be filled, partially filled or empty.

quantity.description: The number of logistics packages at this level.

items.description: Physical markings or labels on individual packages or transport units for shipping purposes.

type.description: A type, expressed as text, of this logistics package.

typeCode.description: A code specifying the type of logistics package.

Volume.description: An amount, size, or extent as established by measuring.

Weight.description: The numeric value determined by weight measuring.
